title: Building Energy Prediction Modeling and Active Learning Fundamentals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic data analysis concepts and proficiency in smartphone utilization
context.additional_context: Introductory course for general citizens on building energy prediction modeling principles and active learning techniques, linking real-life examples to bias issues and solutions in real-time data collection

learning_goals: Learners can describe 3+ impacts of data bias on building energy predictions
Learners can create design blueprints by applying active learning-based data collection strategies to real-world cases
Learners can perform simple energy prediction model verification processes using mobile apps
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
